title: Suspect's Cologne Gives Him Away To Police K-9 Unit
teaser: Police near Albany, Ore., lost an ex-con in a high-speed chase. In the end, vanity — as well as a K-9 unit — was his undoing. It was dark, but a strong scent wafted through the morning air.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
